basic_information.scholarship_name: Amy Wagner Memorial Scholarship for Reading Specialists

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to graduate students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing a Masters of Education Â– Reading Specialist. Eligibility Requirements Graduate student pursuing their Master's of Education in Reading Preparing to become a Reading Specialist Demonstrates financial need Endorsed by (3) professors/community references Demonstrates high scholarship (Overall GPA, Content GPA, and Current Coursework GPA will be used to determine) Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
